name: Inslices
overview:
Think beyond bookmarks. Inslices helps users to collect, share and organize relevant portions of any web page while surfing through a bookmarklet or Firefox Add-on.

Inslices is not another bookmarking tool: it lets users extract exactly what matters to them from a sentence or video to the pivotal content of a web page.

Inslices scans the page and suggests relevant text, images or videos. No ads, unnecessary navigation items, comments, or any other extra stuff, just the content itself.

Once sliced, every selected content will be sent to the dashboard as a visual bookmark, from which users can organize their discoveries , receive cool stuffs or follow other users slices.

Inslices’ goal is make the collection and sharing of web content possible in one click.
